TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EditorPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class EditorPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含 控制項的集合，用來編輯 控制項的屬性、配置、外觀和行為。

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used for editing the properties, layout, appearance, and behavior of controls.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是唯讀的集合通常所使用的控制項區域來追蹤一組區域所包含的控制項。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by an zone to track the set of controls contained by the zone. 當 Web 組件頁面進入編輯模式，並在使用者選取要編輯的控制項時，便會開始編輯的程序。When a Web Parts page enters edit mode, and a user selects a control to edit, the editing process begins. 建立新的區域物件，內含區域所包含的控制項。The zone creates a new object consisting of the controls contained by the zone. 在編輯程序中的各種階段，「 區域存取物件儲存或擷取屬性值之間集合中的控制項和控制目前正在編輯。At various phases in the editing process, the zone accesses the object to save or retrieve property values between the controls in the collection and the control currently being edited. 您可以建立的控制項，如果您需要執行一組的某些大量作業，例如您自己以程式設計方式使用集合控制項。You can create an collection of controls for your own programmatic use if, for example, you need to perform some mass operation on a set of controls. 即使物件是唯讀，您可以對基礎的控制項集合中所參考的屬性以程式設計方式變更。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範幾種用途的類別。The following code example demonstrates several uses of the class. 有四個部分，此程式碼範例：There are four parts to this code example: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 自訂類別控制項，名為`TextDisplayWebPart`，參考網頁中以及編輯時控制項。A class for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page and is edited by the controls. - 參考的 Web 網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，包含具有數個控制項控制從該區域，在宣告的 Web 組件控制項，並包含一些事件導向的程式碼，來建立及操作物件。A Web page that references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, contains an control with several of the controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and contains some event-driven code to create and manipulate an object. - 當您載入瀏覽器中，程式碼範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the code example works when you load it in a browser. 這個程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項，可讓使用者變更網頁上的顯示模式。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. 如需詳細資料會顯示此控制項中模式和原始碼的說明，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#4)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分是`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The second part of the code example is the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩個編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 請注意控制項的屬性，名為`ContentText`; 這個屬性會保留使用者在文字方塊中輸入的值。Note that the control has a property named `ContentText`; this property holds the value that the user enters in the text box. 當控制項處於編輯模式，以及標準時，就可以編輯這個自訂屬性控制屬性。This custom property can be edited when the control is in edit mode, along with the standard control properties. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 請注意，``頁面的項目包含三個宣告控制項。Notice that the `` element for the page contains declarations for three controls. 這些控制項的兩個會成為自訂的一部分時建立的物件`Button1_Click`方法執行。Two of these controls become part of a custom object that is created when the `Button1_Click` method executes. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#1)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取網頁切換至編輯模式**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**，編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到所有控制項。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 您按一下**建立 EditorPartCollection** 按鈕，查看影響在操作的程式碼所建立的控制項物件。You click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button to see the effects on the controls that are created by the code that is manipulating the object. 另外而且請注意，控制項可讓您編輯自訂`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`屬性。Also, notice that the control allows you to edit the custom `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property. 這是可行的因為屬性以標示`WebBrowsable`原始程式碼控制項中的屬性。This is possible because the property is marked with a `WebBrowsable` attribute in the source code for the control. 如果您更新編輯的 UI 中的屬性值，您必須將網頁傳回給一般瀏覽模式，以查看更新的效果`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`屬性。If you update the property value in the editing UI, you must return the page to normal browse mode to see the effect of updating the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別新的空執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an empty new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會初始化空的執行個體類別。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 這個多載建構函式會在內部使用類別於其方法建立空的集合物件。This overload of the constructor is used internally by the class in its method to create an empty collection object. 區域，然後建立的所有執行個體控制項在宣告子區域的範本，並將它們新增到集合中使用的內部方法。The zone then creates instances of all the controls declared in the child zone template, and uses an internal method to add them to the collection. 您無法使用的這個多載建構函式建立的新執行個體並加入給它的控制項。You cannot use this overload of the constructor to create a new instance of and add controls to it. 您必須使用其中一個其他多載的建構函式而。You must use one of the other overloads for the constructor instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection editorParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，方法是傳入 控制項的 集合。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的執行個體類別，以及集合中的傳遞控制項。The constructor initializes an instance of the class and passes in a collection of controls. 這是一個多載可用來建立新的建構函式物件並加入給它的控制項。This is one overload of the constructor that you can use to create a new object and add controls to it. 即使建構函式所建立的執行個體是唯讀的您仍然可以存取個別以程式設計方式控制集合中，並呼叫其屬性和方法。Even though the instance created by the constructor is read-only, you can still access the individual controls in the collection programmatically and call their properties and methods. 使用常見的案例之一建構函式就是如果您想要執行的一整組某些批次作業控制項，例如變更內容、 外觀或相關的群組，其中的位置。One common scenario for using the constructor would be if you want to perform some batch operation on an entire set of controls, such as changing the content, appearance, or position of a related group of them. 使用另一個常見案例建構函式開發自訂您想要將伺服器控制項，與建立關聯，讓使用者可以編輯控制項的自訂屬性的控制項。Another common scenario for using the constructor is developing custom controls that you want to associate with a server control, so that users can edit custom properties on your control. 在此案例中，您的伺服器控制項必須實作介面，並為該工作的一部分，它必須實作方法。In this scenario, your server control must implement the interface, and as part of that task, it must implement the method. 在該方法中，若要啟用自訂控制項來編輯您的伺服器控制項，您必須新增控制項執行個體，例如物件。In that method, to enable the custom controls to edit your server control, you must add the controls to an instance, such as an object. 然後您可以將傳遞的集合控制項建構函式來建立新的物件，其中區域使用設定的所有控制項，並開始編輯程序。Then you can pass the collection of controls to the constructor to create a new object, which the zone uses to set up all the controls and begin the editing process. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂和即使集合是唯讀的仍會執行批次作業，若要變更個別集合中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom and, even though the collection is read-only, still perform a batch operation to change the individual controls in the collection. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`事件建立物件中加入兩個，這三個控制物件，頁面中，並接著會建立新物件使用建構函式。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an object, adds two of the three controls in the page to the object, and then creates a new object using the constructor. 它也會示範如何進行變更，以及在基礎控制項，即使這個集合是唯讀狀態。It also demonstrates how you can make changes to the underlying controls, even though the collection is read-only. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 您可以在瀏覽器中載入網頁並選取網頁切換至編輯模式**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。You can load the page in a browser and switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**，編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到所有控制項。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 您按一下**建立 EditorPartCollection**按鈕，查看對這兩個效果控制項加入至物件。You click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button to see the effects on the two controls that are added to the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart editorPart) cil managed

param.name: editorPart
param.span: 正對其集合成員狀態進行測試的 。

span.span: The being tested for its status as a member of the collection.

summary.span: 傳回值，指出集合中是否存在特定的控制項。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.

returns.span: 指出集合中是否存在 的布林值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the is in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷是否特定控制項已在物件。The method determines whether a specific control is already in the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷是否為特定控制項處於物件。The following code example demonstrates how to determine whether a particular control is in an object. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`事件不會新增`LayoutEditorPart1`控制權傳輸至物件時，它會加入其他控制項。The code in the `Button1_Click` event does not add the `LayoutEditorPart1` control to the object when it adds the other controls. 若要確認`LayoutEditorPart1`控制項不是在集合中，程式碼會使用方法。To confirm that the `LayoutEditorPart1` control is not in the collection, the code uses the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取網頁切換至編輯模式**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**，編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以查看所有控制項。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the all the controls. 如果您按一下**建立 EditorPartCollection** 按鈕，您會注意到的背景色彩`LayoutEditorPart1`控制項是不同於其他控制項，因為它不屬於物件。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the background color of the `LayoutEditorPart1` control is different from the other controls, because it is not part of the object.

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart[] array, int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (array As EditorPart(), index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(cli::array <System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::EditorPart ^> ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: 要包含控制項之複製集合的 。

span.span: An to contain the copied collection of controls.

param.name: index
param.span: 放置集合內容的陣列起點。

span.span: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.

summary.span: 複製集合至 控制項的陣列。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很有用，當您想要建立自訂的陣列可以包含控制項物件，這些控制項的子集或超集的這些控制項。The method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來建立自訂的陣列，控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a custom array of controls. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`事件建立的陣列控制時，會新增`LayoutEditorPart1`控制項陣列，然後再使用方法，將複製從控制項物件陣列。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an array of controls, adds the `LayoutEditorPart1` control to the array, and then uses the method to copy the controls from the object to the array. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取網頁切換至編輯模式**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**，編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到所有控制項。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 如果您按一下**建立 EditorPartCollection** 按鈕，您會注意到頁面底部附近有列出的自訂陣列中的所有控制項的標題。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the titles of all the controls in the custom array are listed near the bottom of the page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Empty As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 參考集合的靜態、唯讀和空執行個體。

span.span: References a static, read-only, empty instance of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態、 唯讀、 空白執行個體可減少在您要從方法傳回適當的物件類型，或比較執行個體與另一個物件，空集合執行個體，但您不需要將成員加入的情況下的記憶體使用量執行個體。A static, read-only, empty instance of reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart editorPart) cil managed

span.span: An that is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 傳回集合特定成員的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.

returns.span: 對應於集合中 控制項之索引的整數。

span.span: An integer that corresponds to the index of an control in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，如果您有多個上 Web 組件 頁面上，您的控制項必須要在集合中尋找特定的控制項。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to locate a particular control in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來找出控制物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to locate an control in an object. 若要執行範例所需的完整程式碼，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`事件建立物件，然後使用方法來找出`PropertyGridEditorPart1`控制在集合中，以及設定其屬性。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an object, and then uses the method to locate the `PropertyGridEditorPart1` control in the collection, and set its property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以選取網頁切換至編輯模式**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下 **編輯**，編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯的使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到所有控制項。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 如果您按一下**建立 EditorPartCollection** 按鈕，您會注意到`PropertyGridEditorPart1`控制項，這是靠近頁面底部，有一個標題，但沒有框線。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the `PropertyGridEditorPart1` control, which is near the bottom of the page, has a title but no border.

MemberSignature.Value: Default Public ReadOnly Property Item(index As Integer) As EditorPart

param.name: index
param.span: 集合中特定 的索引。

span.span: The index of a particular in a collection.

summary.span: 根據唯一識別項，傳回集合的特定成員。

span.span: Returns a specific member of the collection according to a unique identifier.

value.span: 位在集合中指定索引處的 。

span.span: An at the specified index in the collection.
